function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smart technologies for mass surveillance and enforcement of pandemic protocols","Impact":"Infringement of privacy, potential human rights violations, and public distrust","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations and oversight, ensure transparency and accountability, and involve public participation in decision-making","Technologies":"Drones, AI-enabled systems, thermal cameras, smartphone apps","People":"Public at risk of privacy violations and human rights infringements","Owner":"Government authorities, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Spread of fake news complicating crisis management","Impact":"Confusion and misinformation leading to ineffective response, panic, and distrust","Mitigation":"Promote transparent communication, fact-checking, and dissemination of accurate information, and discourage the spread of fake news","Technologies":"Communication platforms, fact-checking tools","People":"General public and authorities at risk of misinformation","Owner":"Media organizations, government authorities, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Spread and transmission of virus in public places","Impact":"Increased transmission of virus, heightened risk of infection, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement measures for social distancing, usage of personal protective equipment, and effective communication of health guidelines","Technologies":"Smart technologies for crowd monitoring, contact tracing apps, and public health campaigns","People":"General public at risk of infection","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
